Files | Data Structures | Macros | Typedefs | Functions
L3 Firewall Driver API

Files

file  fwlibl3.h
 This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of L3FW. This also contains some related macros.
 

Data Structures

struct  l3fwInstSummary
 Structure for L3 Firewall Instance summary. More...
 
struct  l3fwMasterList
 Structure for L3 Firewall Masters list along with with permission. More...
 

Macros

#define L3FW_NUM_MASTER_MAX   (16U)
 Maximum number of masters for L3 Firewall.

Function Documentation

int32_t FWLIBL3ClearErrorLog ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  portNum 
)

This API will clear error information for L3FW Module for given port number.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
portNumPort number.
Returns
status Configuration status..
int32_t FWLIBL3ConfigRegion ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const l3fwRegionConfigParams_t *  regionParams,
uint32_t  numOfMasters,
const l3fwMasterList_t *  masterList 
)

This API will configure region for L3FW Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionParamsConfiguration parameters for region.
numOfMastersNumber of masters for which MRM permission is to set.
masterListList containing list of masters along with permissions.
Returns
status Configuration status.
int32_t FWLIBL3GetErrorLog ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  portNum,
l3fwRegionErrorStatus_t *  errorInfo 
)

This API will read and return error information for L3FW Module for given port number.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
portNumPort number.
errorInfoError information. Refer enum l3fwRegionErrorStatus_t. Contents valid only if status = STW_SOK
Returns
status Returns STW_EBADARGS if invalid base address Returns STW_EFAIL if no error in firewall instance Returns STW_SOK otherwise
int32_t FWLIBL3RegionDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId,
uint32_t  portNum 
)

This API will disable region for port for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to disable.
portNumPort number for which region is to disable.
Returns
status Configuration status.
int32_t FWLIBL3RegionEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId,
uint32_t  portNum 
)

This API will enable region for port for L3FW.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to enable.
portNumPort number for which region is to enable.
Returns
status Configuration status.
int32_t FWLIBL3UpdateMRMPermissions ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionId,
uint32_t  numOfMasters,
const l3fwMasterList_t *  masterList 
)

This API will update MRM permissions for a region for L3FW Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the L3FW Registers.
regionIdRegion ID to configure.
numOfMastersNumber of masters for which MRM permission is to set.
masterListList containing list of masters along with permissions.
Returns
status Configuration status.
